title: Awesome List Updates on Jun 28, 2024

items.title: Free for Dev
items.content_text:
### BaaS

*   [bismuth.cloud](https://www.bismuth.cloud/) — Our AI will boostrap your Python API on our function runtime and hosted storage, build and host for free in our online editor or locally with your favorite tools.
items.content_html:
BaaS

  • bismuth.cloud — Our AI will boostrap your Python API on our function runtime and hosted storage, build and host for free in our online editor or locally with your favorite tools.

items.title: Awesome Polars
items.content_text:
### Blog posts / Miscellaneous

*   [Polars: The Must-Know Data Frame Library Every Data Scientist Should Know](https://ansababy.medium.com/polars-the-must-know-dataframe-library-every-data-scientist-should-know-209e47acceb8) - A blog post that provides a good first guide to the features of Polars by [@AnsaBaby](https://github.com/AnsaBaby).
items.content_html:
Blog posts / Miscellaneous

  • Polars: The Must-Know Data Frame Library Every Data Scientist Should Know - A blog post that provides a good first guide to the features of Polars by @AnsaBaby.

items.title: Awesome Cl
items.content_text:
### Others / Web project skeletons and generators

*   [cl-cookie (⭐19)](https://github.com/fukamachi/cl-cookie) HTTP Cookie (jar) manager: parse and write (set-)cookie headers, compare cookies, optional cookie attribute sanity check. [MIT](https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT)
items.content_html:
Others / Web project skeletons and generators

  • cl-cookie (⭐19) HTTP Cookie (jar) manager: parse and write (set-)cookie headers, compare cookies, optional cookie attribute sanity check. MIT

items.title: Awesome Opentofu
items.content_text:
### Tools / Tests

*   [Terratest (⭐7.7k)](https://github.com/gruntwork-io/terratest) - Go library that makes writing automated tests for your infrastructure code easier.

### Tools / Platforms

*   [terrakube (⭐666)](https://github.com/AzBuilder/terrakube) - Open-source platform with a private registry, remote state, custom flows, scheduled workspaces, and visual states.

### Tools / Registry

*   [library.tf](https://library.tf/) - An indexer of registries for providers and modules with insights and documentation.
items.content_html:
Tools / Tests

  • Terratest (⭐7.7k) - Go library that makes writing automated tests for your infrastructure code easier.

Tools / Platforms

  • terrakube (⭐666) - Open-source platform with a private registry, remote state, custom flows, scheduled workspaces, and visual states.

Tools / Registry

  • library.tf - An indexer of registries for providers and modules with insights and documentation.

items.title: Awesome Go
items.content_text:
### IoT (Internet of Things)

*   [smart-home (⭐92)](https://github.com/e154/smart-home) - Software package for IoT automation.
items.content_html:
IoT (Internet of Things)

items.title: Awesome Mac
items.content_text:
### Utilities / Productivity

*   [Freeter](https://freeter.io/) - Open-source app that allows you to gather everything you need for work in one place, organized by projects and workflows, and have a quick access to them. [![Open-Source Software](https://jaywcjlove.github.io/sb/ico/min-oss.svg "Open Source Software")](https://github.com/FreeterApp/Freeter) ![Freeware](https://jaywcjlove.github.io/sb/ico/min-free.svg "Freeware")
items.content_html:
Utilities / Productivity

  • Freeter - Open-source app that allows you to gather everything you need for work in one place, organized by projects and workflows, and have a quick access to them.

items.title: Awesome Rust
items.content_text:
### Applications

*   [Ryot (⭐2.6k)](https://github.com/ignisda/ryot) - A self hosted application to track media consumption, fitness, etc.
*   [zellij (⭐25k)](https://github.com/zellij-org/zellij) - A terminal multiplexer (workspace) with batteries included

### Applications / Games

*   [buxx/OpenCombat (⭐103)](https://github.com/buxx/OpenCombat) - A realtime 2nd world war tactical game

### Development tools / Debugging

*   [kxxt/tracexec (⭐325)](https://github.com/kxxt/tracexec) \[[tracexec](https://crates.io/crates/tracexec)] - Tracer for execve{,at} and pre-exec behavior, launcher for debuggers.

### Libraries / Asynchronous

*   [igumnoff/gabriel2 (⭐27)](https://github.com/igumnoff/gabriel2) \[[gabriel2](https://crates.io/crates/gabriel2)] - Gabriel2: An actor-model library based on Tokio
items.content_html:
Applications

  • Ryot (⭐2.6k) - A self hosted application to track media consumption, fitness, etc.
  • zellij (⭐25k) - A terminal multiplexer (workspace) with batteries included

Applications / Games

  • buxx/OpenCombat (⭐103) - A realtime 2nd world war tactical game

Development tools / Debugging

  • kxxt/tracexec (⭐325) [tracexec] - Tracer for execve{,at} and pre-exec behavior, launcher for debuggers.

Libraries / Asynchronous

  • igumnoff/gabriel2 (⭐27) [gabriel2] - Gabriel2: An actor-model library based on Tokio
